Name: Valkyrie: Journey To Midgard
About the game: About This Game 'Defeats fierce monsters, loots treasures while trying to survive in the dark dungeon'. In this hardcore RPG, you will play the role of a Valkyrie. She has traveled to Midgard to retrieve Dragon Orb - one of 4 greatest divine treasures. It will be a difficult adventure with countless monsters block her way and they are only getting stronger and stronger. To be able to survive, you will have to learn to adapt to the situation, customize your fighting style accordingly . Key Features - Hardcore RPG - Highly customizable fighting style You may also like these games: / /
